snippet: The National Security Agency is tracking the movements of hundreds of millions of cellphones in an effort to find suspicious travel patterns or activities by intelligence targets, according to documents leaked by Edward J. Snowden.
abstract: New documents leaked by Edward J Snowden reveal that the National Security Agency is tracking the location and movements of hundreds of millions of cellphones outside the United States in an effort to find suspicious travel patterns or coordinated activities by intelligence targets.
lead_paragraph: The National Security Agency is tracking the movements of hundreds of millions of cellphones in an effort to find suspicious travel patterns or activities by intelligence targets, according to documents leaked by Edward J. Snowden.

headline.main: Documents Say Phones Outside U.S. Are Tracked
headline.print_headline: Documents Say Phones Outside U.S. Are Tracked

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
